Package org.apache.taverna.activities.wsdl

Contains the activity classes required to interact with a WSDL based web-service.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InputPortTypeDescriptorActivity
    Interface for an activity such as WSDLActivity and XMLInputSplitterActivity that can provide TypeDescriptors for its inputs.
    OutputPortTypeDescriptorActivity
    Interface for an activity such as WSDLActivity and XMLOutputSplitterActivity that can provide TypeDescriptors for it's outputs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    T2WSDLSOAPInvoker
    Invokes SOAP based Web Services from T2.
    WSDLActivity
    An asynchronous Activity that is concerned with WSDL based web-services.
    WSDLActivityConfigurationBean
    A standard Java Bean that provides the details required to configure a WSDLActivity.
    WSDLActivityDescriptorChecker  
    WSDLActivityFactory
    An ActivityFactory for creating WSDLActivity.
    WSDLActivityHealthChecker  
    WSDLOperationConfigurationBean
    Configuration for a WSDL operation.

Package org.apache.taverna.activities.wsdl Description

Contains the activity classes required to interact with a WSDL based web-service.
